EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners (1348516545.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1348516545.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Dave, It was so nice speaking to you this afternoon. I know we have some basics highlighted in the email below but I wanted to add this information: Highlights of MBO’s Proposed solution/Fees: <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/SMB_MBO_Partners_Pricing.pdf>· Defer each contractor to an MBO Consultant Services Advisor (like myself) for initial vetting and assessment. From there, contractor will engage in one of the following ways:o MBO “Exec” <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> – 1099 consultant is converted to W2 paid by MBO (5% - bill rate uplift).o MBO Qualified “Sub” –1099 consultant/small business paid by MBO, full indemnification (3.5%- bill rate uplift).o Compliance only – consultant paid by Husted Communications, limited indemnification ($300 per compliance – billed on separate invoice).o Implementation cost – TBD based on scope of work ** Please note I stated that the Sub option was 3% on the phone, I was mistaken it is 3.5%. I apologize for the error. We touched on some (not all) of these options so I wanted to have them summarized for you. The next step would be to schedule a call via online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D> and we can review in greater detail. I will conintue to be in touch, please do not hestidate to reach out to me directly if you have any qestions. Thank you,Sara___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, September 21, 2012 4:05 PM To: 'dave@hustedcommunications.com' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Dave, It was a pleasure speaking quickly speaking with you this afternoon. I’ve enclosed a few things as summary to our call that highlights the: - Benefit we provide to consultants. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D> And here is a list of items that highlight the benefits to your company: - Complete overview <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mboenterprise.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D> and service we provide to companies who refer us consultants to be engaged.
- We eliminate reclassification risk and mitigate co-employment <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help/mitigate-risk?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D> and business liability risk for your company.
- We drive adoption for you, by making it easier to recruit and retain talent <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help/drive-adoption?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
- We can hold security clearances <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Security_Clearance_Info_Sheet_Generic.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I will follow up with you as promised, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D> Best regards, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsGd%2B%2Fu%2BNJ63ukDjNb5ahuL1pAPjowYE91kUUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
